name: octazooka
caption: Octazooka

effect.short: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Has a 50% chance to lower the target's [accuracy]{mechanic:accuracy} by one [stage]{mechanic:stage}.

flavorText:
The user attacks by spraying ink in the target’s face
or eyes. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.
